Text: Any way to fix tracker problems? Every time I download from EZTV, it's hit or miss. Sometimes it will start downloading other times it wont even give me one seed. please help.

Deavsiri..I have the smae problem with eztv torrents. It seems to me this happens when only:
http://eztv.tracker.thepiratebay.org/announce
udp://eztv.tracker.thepiratebay.org:80/announce

are in the tracker option (not sure what you use, I use Bitlord) ad these to torrents you have a problem with:

http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce
http://tracker.publicbt.com:80/announce
udp://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce
udp://tracker.publicbt.com:80/announce

@munky261

Thanks for the temporary fix for that, I was having the same problem, seems to recognize all seed and peers but unable to connect them, with those the download now proceeds, thanks!
to end was cut, but thanks anyway
